Job Title: Plumbing Department Manager

Location: Andover, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Position Overview: Plumbing Department Manager

I am working with a reputable engineering consulting firm that is currently seeking a dynamic and experienced Plumbing Department Head to lead their plumbing engineering team. The ideal candidate will oversee all aspects of plumbing design projects, mentor junior staff, and collaborate with clients and project stakeholders to deliver exceptional results. This role offers the opportunity to lead a talented team, work on diverse projects, and contribute to the growth and success of our firm.

Key Responsibilities

Lead and manage the plumbing engineering department, including staff supervision, resource allocation, and performance management.Provide technical expertise and guidance to project teams throughout the design and implementation of plumbing systems for commercial, institutional, and industrial facilities.Collaborate with clients, architects, engineers, and contractors to define project requirements, develop design solutions, and ensure compliance with regulatory standards and industry best practices.Oversee the preparation of plumbing design drawings, specifications, and calculations using industry-standard software and tools.Conduct technical reviews, quality assurance checks, and code compliance evaluations to ensure the accuracy and integrity of project deliverables.Monitor project schedules, budgets, and progress, and implement corrective actions as needed to achieve project objectives and meet client expectations.Foster a collaborative and inclusive work environment, promote professional development, and mentor junior staff to enhance their skills and capabilities.

Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in mechanical engineering, Civil Engineering, or related field. Master's degree preferred.Minimum of 7 years of experience in plumbing engineering, including design and project management roles.Strong technical knowledge of plumbing systems, codes, and standards, with expertise in plumbing design software such as AutoCAD MEP, Revit MEP, and Pipe sizing software.Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with diverse stakeholders and manage multiple projects simultaneously.Proven track record of leading successful plumbing design projects, meeting deadlines, and delivering high-quality results within budget constraints.Commitment to continuous learning, professional development, and staying abreast of industry trends and emerging technologies in plumbing engineering.

Benefits

Competitive salary commensurate with experience.Comprehensive benefits package including medical, dental, and vision insurance.Retirement savings plan with employer matching.Paid time off, including vacation, sick leave, and holidays.Professional development opportunities and tuition reimbursement.Dynamic and inclusive work environment with opportunities for career advancement.

Join Our Team

If you are a motivated and experienced Plumbing Department Head looking for an exciting opportunity to lead a talented team and contribute to the success of a reputable engineering consulting firm, we encourage you to apply.
